articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-built Youth Movement Museum
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-built Youth Movement Museum
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave a field guidance to the newly-built Youth Movement Museum. 
					 He, together with officials, paid a tribute to the full-length statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among youths and children in the general hall of the museum.
					
					 Looking at the statues of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for a while, Kim Jong Un said it is the first time to erect the color statues of the great leaders among youths and children. The statues well show the true picture of our society in which the leader and the masses have become a harmonious whole, he added with pleasure.
					
					 Then he went round show-rooms, a room for revolutionary historic mementoes and other places of the museum.
					
					 He said that photos of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and historic data and mementoes in the show-rooms, arranged in order of every annals of the Korean revolution, are the most valuable national treasure, the eternal asset of the revolution which cannot be bartered for anything. 
					
					 What is the core in the history of the great leaders' guidance over the youth movement is that they had always put forward the young people as the heroes of the times with deep trust in them, he said, noting that under their wise guidance and loving care the Korean youths could cover the glorious road, glorifying the annals of the revolution with heroic feats and shining victories.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership and undying feats of the great leaders who set a brilliant example of the youth movement, foreseeing the protracted nature of the revolution and regarding the youth issue as the important strategic issue decisive of rise and fall of the country and as the most important national priority, our Party could perfectly settle the youth issue, inconceivable in any age and any other country, and build the one and only youth power in the world, he said, adding: This is our great pride.
					
					 The museum comprehends the history of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il youth movement, he said, stressing the need to build up the ranks of lecturers and steadily improve their ability and operate the museum under a meticulous plan in order to conduct an effective education through it.
					
					 Expressing his great satisfaction over the fact that the museum has been well built to clearly show the great leaders' history of guidance over the youth movement and their undying feats for the development of the youth movement and the history of the Korean youths who have covered the road of loyalty following the Party, he highly appreciated the High-speed Youth Shock Brigade for having successfully carried out the militant task given by the Party.
					
					 He gave an instruction on the completion of the Youth Movement Museum, expressing conviction that its officials and lecturers would creditably discharge their honorable duty.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Il Hwan, Jo Yong Won and Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Congratulations to Tunisian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Tunisian FM
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Khemaies Jhinaoui upon his appointment as foreign minister of Tunisia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished him good health and success in his new work.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Burkina Faso
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Burkina Faso
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Jan. 18 sent a congratulatory message to Alpha Barry on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Overseas Compatriots of Burkina Faso.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing and traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests, the message wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Sangwon Cement Complex Surpasses Peak Year Production of Cement Last Year
articles.content:
Sangwon Cement Complex Surpasses Peak Year Production of Cement Last Year
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The working class of the Sangwon Cement Complex surpassed the peak year production of cement last year.
					 Last year they brought about a fresh surge in surpassing the peak year production.
					
					 The complex actively introduced reasonable methods for putting production on a normal track despite the shortage in electric supply, thus effecting great innovation at all production processes and units such as the newly-remodeled kiln No.1.
					
					 It sent more than 1 000 tons of the first batch of production to major project sites such as the construction site of Mirae Scientists Street.
					
					 It successfully fulfilled its production plan for January and the first quarter of the year ahead of schedule.
					
					 Despite many technical problems such as selection of the proper raw materials the complex succeeded in high-quality cement production technology that relies on locally available raw materials and fuel with indigenous efforts and technology.
					
					 All the workers, technicians and officials of the complex waged a devoted drive day and night to produce even one ton of more cement and thus contributed to ushering in a great era of the country's prosperity in which ten years' work is done in just one year.

articles.title: Songnam Primary School Attaches Importance to Table-tennis Education
articles.content:
Songnam Primary School Attaches Importance to Table-tennis Education
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Songnam Primary School in Songchongang District, Hamhung City, is well-known in the general education field of the DPRK for its good operation of table-tennis group. It was awarded the title of the twice model physical training school.
					 The school bagged more than 160 gold medals in the national table-tennis tournaments including the National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize.
					
					 It started the operation of the group in the mid-1970s and produced many promising table-tennis players. Table-tennis aces of this school origin number over 30 including People's Athletes Kim Yun Mi and Kim Hyang Mi, Merited Athlete Wi Pok Sun, Ri Pun Hui who was awarded the Joola Prize and Kim Jong who won gold medals in the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events) and at the table tennis mixed doubles of the 17th Asian Games.
					
					 Kim Chol, a sports teacher of the school, told KCNA that he is proud of being an educator when graduates of the school win gold medals in international tournaments. He added he is determined to train many more reserve table-tennis players in the future.

articles.title: Signal Success in Production of New Varieties of Shoes
articles.content:
Signal Success in Production of New Varieties of Shoes
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Ryuwon Shoes Factory in the DPRK has achieved a signal success in the production of new varieties of shoes in the efforts to help improve the people's standard of living.
					 In response to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of regarding the improvement of the people's standard of living as the most important state affair, the factory has channeled big efforts into developing world-famous products and commodities with a competitive edge.
					
					 In this regard, Im Ui Ung, chief engineer of the factory, told KCNA that the factory newly built more scientific and technological forces specializing in developing new products.
					
					 They are technicians and skilled workers well versed in knowledge and technical skills in shoes production. 
					
					 The factory has built computer-aided designing process for the production of new varieties of sports shoes and is operating dozens of equipment. 
					
					 On the basis of the inquiry made into the shapes and fashions favored by customers, its technicians have succeeded in developing new varieties of shoes. 
					
					 Diverse patterns and designs of shoes were completed in the first 20 days of the New Year. As a result, samples of shoes have been produced to contribute to increasing the varieties of shoes and making them diverse and multi-color.
					
					 Last year it completed more than 150 shoes designs, nearly 70 of which were put into production.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, visited the factory in mid-January last year and learned in detail about the development of new varieties of shoes there. He advanced the tasks to produce shoes favored by customers and those symbolic of it and impeccable at foreign markets.

articles.title: Exhibition of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Youth and Students Closes
articles.content:
Exhibition of Scientific and Technological Achievements of Youth and Students Closes
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The exhibition of scientific and technological achievements of the youth and students to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League closed with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday.
					 At the exhibition which opened on January 13 research successes in the field of ultra-modern science and technology including IT, nano technology and bio-engineering and at least 140 invention and new technological innovation proposals were highly appreciated as they were conducive to putting the national economy on a new high Juche, modern and scientific basis with indigenous resources and technology.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, those of the youth league and youth and students.
					
					 Certificates, commendations and invention certificates were awarded to youth league committees of Kim Il Sung University and the State Academy of Sciences and successful youth league organizations and participants.

articles.title: DPRK Witnesses Great Achievements in Economic Sectors
articles.content:
DPRK Witnesses Great Achievements in Economic Sectors
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea made many achievements last year in the efforts to develop the national economy by its own efforts and with indigenous technology and resources.
					 Its scientists and technicians registered a lot of successes in scientific researches. The achievements included the development of a dispersive control system and CT.
					
					 Achievements were also registered in energy, materials, railway transport, mining industry and other economic sectors to reinforce the nation's foundation for self-supporting economy.
					
					 High-yielding seeds were bred for increased agricultural production and a method of cultivating "Aeguk Grass", a high-yielding grass for fodder, was established.
					
					 The Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex successfully manufactured the nation's first subway train.
					
					 There appeared Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm and the Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory. And many industrial establishments such as the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, the Pyongyang Catfish Farm and the Wonsan Shoes Factory were updated.
					
					 Manganic ferroalloy production process was established in reliance on a new melting method at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 Meanwhile, more than 63,000 new technical innovation proposals were introduced into production across the country by the April 15 Technical Innovation Shock Brigade.
					
					 Sci-tech rooms took their shapes at least 2,000 units, including industrial establishments and farms.
					
					 All these achievements fully displayed the resolve of the Workers' Party of Korea to bring about a radical turn in building a socialist economic power and a highly-civilized nation by dint of science and technology.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on January 15.
					 Alexandr Gromov, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasions.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Mexico
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed at the building of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico on January 14.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events for highly praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and introducing the successes being achieved by the Korean army and people in their struggle for building a thriving nation and defending the sovereignty of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasions.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on January 14.
					 The chairman of the forum was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to conduct the activities for introducing the greatness of Kim Jong Il through media in the period between January 14 and February 16 and organize political and cultural events including film show, lecture meeting and book and photo exhibition on the occasion of his 74th birth anniversary.

articles.title: DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons Hailed by Figures of Iran, Japan
articles.content:
DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons Hailed by Figures of Iran, Japan
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Iranian and Japanese figures made public statements hailing the DPRK's first successful H-bomb test.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran stated on Jan. 10:
					
					 The DPRK ranked itself among the advanced nuclear weapons states by succeeding in the H-bomb test, a noteworthy event that demonstrated the inexhaustible military power before the world.
					
					 The H-bomb test is a measure for self-defense the DPRK took to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the U.S. ever-increasing nuclear threat and blackmail and firmly ensure the peace in the Korean Peninsula and security in the region.
					
					 It is a gangster-like logic that the U.S. criticizes the DPRK's access to the nuclear weapons even though it is the unique country that used A-bombs and has stockpiled lots of nuclear weapons.
					
					 I fully support the statement of the DPRK government on the first H-bomb test.
					
					 Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, said on Jan. 7:
					
					 The DPRK has ranked itself among the nuclear powers by succeeding in the H-bomb test.
					
					 It is legitimate for the DPRK to make a choice of access to nuclear weapons in defense of the national sovereignty and dignity from the U.S. vicious nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 I respect the Korean party and people making a dynamic advance, upholding the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: DPRK's Success in H-bomb Test Hailed by Congolese, Peruvian Figures
articles.content:
DPRK's Success in H-bomb Test Hailed by Congolese, Peruvian Figures
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Figures of Congo and Peru released statements on Jan. 12 hailing Juche Korea's first H-bomb test.
					 The chairperson of the Congo-Korea Friendship Committee of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples said:
					
					 The blast of H-bomb test conducted by the DPRK has shaken the world.
					
					 Its meaningful echoes resound throughout the international community.
					
					 What is it that makes the DPRK, not a big country, come to oppose the greatest nuclear power to defend its sovereignty and dignity?
					
					 How is peace ensured in the Korean Peninsula where the touch-and-go situation prevails constantly?
					
					 The U.S. styling itself "the world's only superpower" has threatened the independent countries with a nuclear stick and opened to public the countries that were put on the list of its preemptive nuclear strike. The DPRK was also on this list.
					
					 The DPRK took the road to make access to the self-defensive deterrent to cope with the U.S. nuclear blackmail.
					
					 It further bolstered up the nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. intensified nuclear threat.
					
					 The reality in the DPRK teaches the international community the truth that peace can never be achieved by begging.
					
					 The chairman of a branch of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship said the Peruvian people extend warm congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un on the DPRK's success in the H-bomb test.

articles.title: Uruguayan Party Hails DPRK's Success in H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Uruguayan Party Hails DPRK's Success in H-bomb Test
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Communist Party of Uruguay made public a statement on Jan. 13 hailing the DPRK's success in the first H-bomb test.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is of special significance to our party that the DPRK made a success in the first H-bomb test at the present time when the global peace and security are under grave threat due to the imperialists' continued war rackets against the progressive countries.
					
					 The imperialist powers with nuclear weapons fuss about the H-bomb test conducted by socialist Korea for bolstering up the national defence, taking a hypocritical approach to it.
					
					 The U.S., being the sole country that used A-bombs and that is taking on the most aggressive nature, resorts to vicious threats and provocations against socialist Korea in a desperate effort to maintain its position as the "world's only superpower".
					
					 Our party sends a militant salute to the DPRK government and people.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Struggle Supported by Mexicans
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Struggle Supported by Mexicans
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association and the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification made public a joint statement on Jan. 14 in support of Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un advanced the tasks for the Korean people to usher in a golden age in building a thriving socialist nation in his New Year Address for 2016.
					
					 He clarified that the DPRK would counter the aggressors and provokers with a merciless and just blow, a war for the reunification of Korea, by increasing the defence capabilities in every way if they provoke the DPRK even a bit.
					
					 The DPRK made public a government statement which said Juche Korea had succeeded in the first H-bomb test on Jan. 6.
					
					 We sincerely hope to see the earlier reunification of Korea in line with the desire and demand of the nation free from foreign interference, extending support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to defuse the danger of war and safeguard peace and security in the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The full text of a historic conclusion made by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was carried by a Russian Tomskaya Nedeli newspaper on January 8.
					 The paper carried his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Thai and Romanian organizations released statements on January 7 and 11 supporting Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un called this year a significant one when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) would be held and underscored the need to concentrate all the efforts on building an economic giant to bring about a fresh turn in developing the country's economy and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 He clarified the stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to further strengthen solidarity with the peoples of the world who are opposed to aggression and war, domination and subordination, and develop relations of friendship and cooperation with all the countries that respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly to it.
					
					 The Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, in his New Year Address reviewed the victory and successes achieved by the heroic Korean people last year and indicated the goal to be attained in the new year.
					
					 In particular, he set forth a proposal to improve the inter-Korean relations and solve the issue of Korea's reunification with great national unity.
					
					 We fully support his New Year Address.
					
					 We will further dynamically wage the solidarity movement supporting the Korean people in their just struggle this year, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Museo del Movimiento Juvenil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Museo del Movimiento Juvenil
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Museo de Movimiento Juvenil, nuevamente construido.
					El Mariscal, junto con los funcionarios, expreso el homenaje ante las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il entre los jovenes y ninos levantadas en el hall general.
					
					Contemplando en unos minutos el aspecto sonriente del Presidente y el Dirigente, el Mariscal dijo que es la primera vez lo que colocan las estatuas de pie en color de los grandes lideres quienes estan entre los jovenes y ninos. Y mostro una gran satisfaccion diciendo que ha descrito bien el verdadero aspecto de la sociedad coreana donde el lider y las masas logran una unidad monolitica.
					
					Recorrio varios puntos del Museo incluyendo las salas de exhibiciones y la otra de conservacion de los datos de historia revolucionaria.
					
					Asevero que las fotos de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, los datos y objetos historicos expuestos cortesmente en las salas de exhibicion acondicionadas por decadas de la revolucion coreana constituyen los eternos patrimonios de la revolucion incambiables con nada.
					
					Lo mas importante en la historia de direccion de los grandes lideres sobre el movimiento juvenil es que ellos confiaron firmemente en los jovenes y les presentaron siempre como protagonistas de la epoca, destaco. Y prosiguio que gracias a la sabia orientacion y el ardiente amor de los grandes lideres los jovenes coreanos pudieron recorrer por el camino glorioso adornando las decadas de la revolucion con las proezas heroicas y las victorias enorgullecedoras.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion y las inmortales hazanas de los grandes lideres que al prever el caracter prolongado de la revolucion crearon un brillante ejemplo del movimiento juvenil presentando el problema juvenil como importantisimo asunto estrategico relacionado con la prosperidad o ruina del pais el Partido del Trabajo de Corea pudo solucionar perfectamente el problema juvenil, asunto que no se podia lograrlo ninguna epoca ni un pais, y construir la unica  potencia de la juventud en este mundo, puntualizo y asevero que esto deviene un gran orgullo y honor para nosotros.
					
					En el museo esta sintetizada la historia del movimiento juvenil de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, acoto y anadio que es preciso formar bien la fila de los conferenciantes, elevar constantemente sus niveles y organizar con escrupulosidad la administracion del museo parar realizar sustancialmente la educacion a traves del museo.
					
					Se complacio mucho de que el museo fue construido excelentemente para dar a conocer bien  la historia de direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente sobre el movimiento juvenil, sus imperecederas proezas realizadas para el desarrollo e intensificacion del movimiento juvenil y la historia de lucha de los jovenes coreanos que vinieron por el unico camino de fidelidad bajo la orientacion del partido. Y evaluo altamente las proezas de la Brigada de Choque Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad que llevo a feliz termino la tarea combativa dada por el partido.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y conferenciantes del museo cumpliran satisfactoriamente con su honrosa mision y dio las instrucciones referentes a la inauguracion del museo.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Il Hwan, Jo Yong Won y Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Muchos exitos logrados por RPDC con fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos propios
articles.content:
Muchos exitos logrados por RPDC con fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos propios
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- En el ano pasado, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea logro muchos exitos en la modernizacion con las fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos propios y la realizacion de los productos nacionales.
					Los cientificos y los tecnicos lograron exitos en la investigacion de ciencias de punta.
					
					Fueron conquistadas las metas sofisticadas de significacion estatal en los dominios de las ciencias y tecnicas principales inclusive la medular tecnologia basica.
					
					Se desarrollaron el sistema de control de forma dispersa y la pizarra telefonica central numerica, necesarios a la realizacion de CNC y la automatizacion de la cadena de produccion, el equipo CT cerebral de forma espiral, aparato de radiografica analitica por el ordenador y otros.
					
					Se invento el reactivo para el cultivo de la celula troncal y se realizo la produccion de la materia estandarizada con las materias domesticas.
					
					Fueron alcanzados los exitos de investigacion cientifica en diversos dominios de la economia nacional inclusive la energia, materia, transporte ferroviario y explotacion, consolidando mas la base de la economia independiente del pais.
					
					Se logro notables exitos en la rama de industria ligera y se establecio el metodo de cultivo de "hierba Aeguk", planta forrajera de buena variedad.
					
					En todas las ramas y unidades de la economia nacional se libro una energica lucha por la utilizacion de las materias primas, materiales e instalaciones nacionales.
					
					Los obreros del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae fabricaron el primer tren electrico subterraneo y se levantaron la Fabrica de Hongos de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Procesamiento de Maiz de Pyongyang y otras y se convirtieron como ejemplares de la modernizacion la Fabrica de Alimentos para Ninos de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang, la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan y otras unidades.
					
					Se introdujeron los exitos de ciencias y tecnicas avanzadas para el funcionamiento normal de las centrales y el aumento de produccion de electricidad y carbon y se acondiciono en el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae la cadena de produccion de ferromanganeso en que se aplico nuevo metodo de fundicion.
					
					Se mejoro considerablemente el papel de la Brigada de Cientificos y Tecnicos 17 de Febrero, el grupo por las tres revoluciones y la Brigada de Innovacion Tecnica 15 de Abril.
					
					Los brigadistas de esta ultima unidad inventaron mas de 63 mil innovaciones tecnicas y las aplicaron en la practica.
					
					Se acondicionaron las salas de divulgacion cientifica y tecnica en mas de 2 mil unidades, gracias a lo cual se levanto en el pais una furiosa llama de creacion de nueva tecnologia.
					
					Los exitos demostraron energicamente la decision y la voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de registrar cambio en la construccion de la potencia economica socialista, la civilizada anteponiendo la ciencia y la tecnologia, y infundieron una verdad de que el lema de dar prioridad a sus propias fuerzas de la RPDC permite crear sin numero de innovaciones.

articles.title: Escuela Primaria de Songnam
articles.content:
Escuela Primaria de Songnam
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- La Escuela Primaria de Songnam del municipio de Songchongang de la ciudad de Hamhung esta conocida en la rama de ensenanza general de la RPDC como unidad que gestiona bien el grupo de ping pong y recibio el doble titulo de la Escuela Ejemplar en el Deporte.
					Conquisto mas de 160 medallas de oro en las competencias nacionales que tuvieron lugar en el tiempo pasado inclusive la Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares por la Copa Jongilbong.
					
					Desde a mediados de la decada de 1970, la escuela impulso la gestion del grupo de ping pong para formar a muchos competentes jugadores de reserva. Entre ellas se distinguen las deportistas del Pueblo Kim Yun Mi y Kim Hyang Mi y la deportista benemerita Wi Pok Sun, asi como 30 maestros en el deporte. 
					
					Ri Pun Hi, quien recibio el premio Joola y Kim Jong, quien obtuvo la medalla de oro en el 52o Campeonato Mundial de Tenis de Mesa de la Federacion Mundial de Tenis de Mesa y en el doble mixto de la competencia de tenis de mesa de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos, son procedentes de esta escuela.
					
					Los especialistas y los aficionados estan muy interesados a elevado nivel tecnico de los miembros del grupo de ping pong de esa escuela. Y los conjuntos deportivos de la provincia y el centro prestan mucha atencion a ese plantel docente en la seleccion de los jugadores.
					
					Kim Chol, profesor de deporte, dijo a la ACNC que vuelve a sentir cuan justa es la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en materia de las actividades de los grupos deportivos especializados cada vez que recibe la noticia de que los graduados de la escuela glorifican con preseas doradas el honor de la patria.
					
					Tomo la decision de formar a muchos jugadores de reserva de ping pong dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion.

articles.title: Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon
articles.content:
Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- La Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon concentra sus fuerzas en desarrollar las excelentes mercancias competitivas en los mercados internacionales en pleno acato de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que considera la vida de la poblacion como el mas importante de todos los asuntos estatales.
					Im Ui Ung, ingeniero-jefe de esta fabrica, dijo a la ACNC que formo mas a nuevas fuerzas tecnicas que se dedican al desarrollo de nuevos productos en la sala de preparacion tecnica y la del desarrollo de calzados deportivos y prosiguio:
					
					Ellos son los tecnicos y obreros calificados que tienen los conocimientos especializados, la tecnica y la habilidad por los elementos de los calzados incluyendo la suela de zapatos, la pala, el adhesivo, la horma de zapatos y los materiales.
					
					La fabrica estructuro los procesos de diseno por la computadora e instalo decenas de equipos de mas de 10 especies para establecer los procesos tecnicos para el desarrollo de los calzados deportivos.
					
					El objetivo de la meditacion y la investigacion de los tecnicos y los obreros calificados reside en desarrollar los zapatos que gocen de la reputacion del pueblo disminuyendo el precio de costo.
					
					Ellos estudian cuales son los tipos de zapatos preferidos por el pueblo y dan el acabado a los dibujos aunando los talentos creadores, de manera que dan acicate al trabajo del desarrollo de los productos.
					
					Solo en 20 dias de este ano perfeccionaron varios dibujos y disenos de los zapatos y presentaron los productos modelos contribuyentes a la diversificacion, la variabilidad y la policromia de los calzados.
					
					Concentrando las fuerzas en el desarrollo de los indices monopolistas, perfeccionaron mas de 150 dibujos y disenos de calzados en el ano pasado.
					
					Al visitar la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon a mediados de enero del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un se entero en detalles del estado del desarrollo de nuevos productos e indico que esta fabrica debe desarrollar con dinamismo la campana para producir los calzados que gocen de la reputacion del pueblo y simbolicen su unidad con la  competitividad en los mercados internacionales.
